mahīdhra pakṣa vyaparopaṇa uddhatam sphurat prabhā maṇḍalam astram ādade

original: raghurbhṛśaṃ vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainikāsrubhiḥ /
analyzed: raghuḥ bhṛśam vakṣasi tena tāḍitaḥ papāta bhūmau saha sainika asrubhiḥ

original: nimeṣamātrādavadhūya ca vyathāṃ sahotthitaḥ sainikaharṣaniḥsvanaiḥ // Ragh(K)_3.61 //
analyzed: nimeṣa mātrāt avadhūya ca vyathām saha utthitaḥ sainika harṣa niḥsvanaiḥ
tathā api śastra vyavahāra niṣṭhure vipakṣa bhāve sthiram asya tasthuṣaḥ

original: tutoṣa vīryātiśayena vṛtrahā padaṃ hi sarvatra guṇairvidhīyate // Ragh(K)_3.62 //
analyzed: tutoṣa vīrya atiśayena vṛtrahā padam hi sarvatra guṇaiḥ vidhīyate

original: asaṅgamadriṣvapi sāravattayā na me tvadanyena visoḍhamāyudham /
analyzed: asaṅgam adriṣu api sāravat tayā na me tvad anyena visoḍham āyudham

original: avaihi māṃ prītamṛte turaṅgamādvaraṃ vṛṇīṣveti tamāha vṛtrahā // Ragh(K)_3.63 //
analyzed: avaihi mām prītam ṛte turaṅgamāt varam vṛṇīṣva iti tam āha vṛtrahā
tatas niṣaṅgāt asamagram uddhṛtam suvarṇa puṅkha dyuti rañjita aṅgulim

original: dilīpasūnuḥ pratisaṃharanniṣuṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ pratyavadatsureśvaram // Ragh(K)_3.64 //
analyzed: dilīpa sūnuḥ pratisaṃharan iṣum priyam vadaḥ pratyavadat sureśvaram

original: amocyamaśvaṃ yadi manyate prabhustataḥ samāpte vidhineva karmaṇi /
analyzed: amocyam aśvam yadi manyate prabhuḥ tatas samāpte vidhinā iva karmaṇi

original: ajasradīkṣātanuradya me guruḥ kratoraśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām // Ragh(K)_3.65 //
analyzed: ajasra dīkṣā tanuḥ adya me guruḥ kratoḥ aśeṣeṇa phalena yujyatām
yathā ca vṛttāntam imam sadaḥ gataḥ trilocana eka aṃśa tayā durāsadaḥ

original: tavaiva sandeśaharādviśāṃpatiḥ śṛṇoti nākeśa tathā vidhīyatām // Ragh(K)_3.66 //
analyzed: tava eva sandeśa harāt viśām patiḥ śṛṇoti nākeśa tathā vidhīyatām
tathā iti kāmam pratiśuśruvān raghoḥ yathāgatam mātali sārathiḥ yayau

original: nṛpasya nātipramanāḥ sadogṛhaṃ sudakṣiṇāsūnurapi nyavartata // Ragh(K)_3.67 //
analyzed: nṛpasya na ati pramanāḥ sadogṛham sudakṣiṇā sūnuḥ api nyavartata
tam abhyanandat prathama prabodhitaḥ prajeśvaraḥ śāsana hāriṇā hareḥ
parāmṛśan harṣa calena pāṇinā tadīyam aṅgam kuliśa vraṇa aṅkitam

original: iti kṣitīśo navatiṃ navādhikāṃ mahākratūnāṃ mahanīyaśāsanaḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣitīśaḥ navatim nava adhikām mahā kratūnām mahanīya śāsanaḥ
samārurukṣuḥ divam āyuṣaḥ kṣaye tatāna sopāna paramparām iva

original: atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ dattvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam /
analyzed: atha sa viṣaya vyāvṛtta ātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpati kakudam dattvā yūne sita ātapa vāraṇam

original: munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam // Ragh(K)_3.70 //
analyzed: muni vana taru chāyām devyā tayā saha śiśriye galita vayasām ikṣvākūṇām idam hi kula vratam
iti raghuvaṃśe mahākāvye tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ

original: sa rājyaṃ guruṇā dattaṃ pratipadyādhikaṃ babhau /
analyzed: sa rājyam guruṇā dattam pratipadya adhikam babhau

original: dinānte nihitaṃ tejaḥ savitreva hutāśanaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.1 //
analyzed: dina ante nihitam tejaḥ savitrā iva hutāśanaḥ

original: nyastaśastraṃ dilīpaṃ ca taṃ ca śuśruvuṣāṃ prabhum /
analyzed: nyasta śastram dilīpam ca tam ca śuśruvuṣām prabhum
rājñām uddhṛta nārāce hṛdi śūlam iva arpitam
puruhūta dhvajasya iva tasya unnayana paṅktayaḥ
nava abhyutthāna darśinyaḥ nananduḥ sa prajāḥ prajāḥ
samam eva samākrāntam dvayam dvirada gāminā
tena siṃhāsanam pitryam akhilam cāri maṇḍalam
chāyā maṇḍala lakṣyeṇa tam adṛśyā kila svayam
padmā padma ātapatreṇa bheje sāmrājya dīkṣitam
parikalpita sānnidhyā kāle kāle ca vandiṣu
stutyam stutibhiḥ arthyābhiḥ upatasthe sarasvatī
manu prabhṛtibhiḥ mānyaiḥ bhuktāḥ yadi api rājabhiḥ
tathā api ananya pūrvā iva tasmin āsīt vasundharā

original: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yuktadaṇḍatayā manaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi sarvasya lokasya yukta daṇḍa tayā manaḥ
ādade na ati śīta uṣṇaḥ nabhasvān iva dakṣiṇaḥ
kāmam kamala pattrāṇām netre tasya anukāriṇī
cakṣuṣmat tā tu śāstreṇa sūkṣma kārya artha darśinā
yathā prahlādanāt candraḥ pratāpāt tapanaḥ yathā
tathā eva saḥ bhūt anvarthaḥ rājā prakṛti rañjanāt
naya vidbhiḥ nave rājñi sat asat ca upadarśitam
pūrvaḥ eva abhavat pakṣaḥ tasmin na abhavat uttaraḥ
manda utkaṇṭhāḥ kṛtāḥ tena guṇa adhika tayā gurau

original: phalena sahakārasya puṣpodgama iva prajāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.12 //
analyzed: phalena sahakārasya puṣpa udgamaḥ iva prajāḥ
pañcānām api bhūtānām utkarṣam pupuṣuḥ guṇāḥ
nave tasmin mahīpāle sarvam navam iva abhavat
labdha praśamana svastham atha enam samupasthitā
pārthiva śrīḥ dvitīyā iva śarad paṅkaja lakṣaṇā
nirvṛṣṭa laghubhiḥ meghaiḥ savituḥ tasya ca ubhayoḥ

original: vardhiṣṇavo diśāṃ bhāgāḥ pratāpāyeva recitāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.15 //
analyzed: vardhiṣṇavaḥ diśām bhāgāḥ pratāpāya iva recitāḥ
adhijyam āyudham kartum samayaḥ yam raghoḥ iti

original: svaṃ dhanuḥ śaṅkiteneva saṃjahre śatamanyunā // Ragh(K)_4.16 //
analyzed: svam dhanuḥ śaṅkitena iva saṃjahre śatamanyunā
puṇḍarīka ātapatraḥ tam vikasat kāśa cāmaraḥ

original: ṛturviḍambayāmāsa na punaḥ prāpa tacchriyam // Ragh(K)_4.17 //
analyzed: ṛtuḥ viḍambayāmāsa na punar prāpa tad śriyam
prasāda su mukhe tasmin candre ca viṣada prabhe
tadā cakṣuṣmatām prītiḥ āsīt samarasā dvayoḥ
haṃsa śreṇiṣu tārāsu kumudvatsu ca vāriṣu
vibhūtayaḥ tadīyānām paryastāḥ yaśasām iva
ikṣu chāyā niṣādi nyaḥ tasya goptuḥ guṇa udayam
ā kumāra kathā udghātam śāli gopyaḥ jaguḥ yaśaḥ
prasasāda udayāt ambhaḥ kumbhayoneḥ mahā ojasaḥ
raghoḥ tu abhibhava āśaṅki cukṣubhe dviṣatām manaḥ
mada udagrāḥ kakudmantaḥ saritām kūlam udru jāḥ
līlā khelam anuprāpuḥ mahā ukṣāḥ tasya vikramam
prasavaiḥ sapta parṇānām mada gandhibhiḥ āhatāḥ
asūyayā iva tat nāgāḥ saptadhā eva prasusruvuḥ
saritaḥ kurvatī gādhāḥ pathaḥ ca āśyāna kardamān

original: yātrāyai codayāmāsa taṃ śakteḥ prathamaṃ śarat // Ragh(K)_4.24 //
analyzed: yātrāyai codayāmāsa tam śakteḥ prathamam śarad
tasmai samyak hutaḥ vahniḥ vājinī rājanā vidhau
pradakṣiṇa arciḥ vyājena hastena iva jayam dadau
sa gupta mūla pratyantaḥ śuddha pārṣṇi raya anvitaḥ
ṣaḍvidham balam ādāya pratasthe diś jigīṣayā
avākiran vayaḥ vṛddhāḥ tam lājaiḥ paura yoṣitaḥ
pṛṣataiḥ mandara uddhūtaiḥ kṣīra ūrmayaḥ iva acyutam

original: sa yayau prathamaṃ prācīṃ tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā /
analyzed: sa yayau prathamam prācīm tulyaḥ prācīnabarhiṣā
ahitān anila uddhūtaiḥ tarjayan iva ketubhiḥ
rajobhiḥ syandana uddhūtaiḥ gajaiḥ ca ghana sannibhaiḥ
bhuvaḥ talam iva vyoma kurvan vyoma iva bhū talam
pratāpaḥ gre tatas śabdaḥ purogāḥ tad anantaram

original: yayau paścādgajānīkaṃ catuḥskandheva sā camūḥ // Ragh(K)_4.30 //
analyzed: yayau paścāt gaja anīkam catur skandhā iva sā camūḥ
purogaiḥ kaluṣāḥ tasya saha prasthāyibhiḥ kṛśāḥ
paścāt prayāyibhiḥ paṅkam cakrire mārga nimnagāḥ
maru pṛṣṭhāni udambhāṃsi nāvyāḥ su pratarāḥ nadīḥ
vipināni prakāśāni śaktimat tvāt cakāra saḥ
sa senām mahatīm karṣan pūrva sāgara gāminīm
babhau hara jaṭā bhraṣṭām gaṅgām iva bhagīrathaḥ
tyājitaiḥ phalam utkhātaiḥ bhagnaiḥ ca bahudhā nṛpaiḥ
tasya āsīt ulbaṇaḥ mārgaḥ pādapaiḥ iva dantinaḥ
paurastyān evam ākrāman tān tān janapadān jitī
prāpa tālī vana śyāmam upakaṇṭham mahā udadheḥ
anamrāṇām samuddhartuḥ tasmāt sindhuḥ ayāt iva
ātmā saṃrakṣitaḥ suhmaiḥ vṛttim āśritya vaitasīm
vaṅgān utkhāya tarasā netā nau sādhana uddhatān
nicakhāna jaya stambhān gaṅgā srotaḥ ntareṣu saḥ
ā pāda padma praṇatāḥ kalamāḥ iva te raghum
phalaiḥ saṃvardhayāmāsuḥ utkhāta pratiropitāḥ
sa tīrtvā kayimām sainyaiḥ baddha dvirada setubhiḥ
utkalā deśita pathaḥ kaliṅga abhimukhaḥ yayau

original: sa pratāpaṃ mahendrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇaṃ nyaveśayat /
analyzed: sa pratāpam mahā indrasya mūrdhni tīkṣṇam nyaveśayat
aṅkuśam dviradasya iva yantā gambhīra vedinaḥ
pratijagrāha kāliṅgaḥ tam astraiḥ gaja sādhanaḥ
pakṣa cheda udyatam śakram śilā varṣī iva parvataḥ
dviṣām viṣahya kākutsthaḥ tatra nārāca durdinam
sat maṅgala snātaḥ iva pratipede jaya śriyam
vāyavya astra vinirdhūtāt pakṣa āviddhāt iva udadheḥ
gaja anīkāt sa kāliṅgam tārkṣyaḥ sarpam iva ādade
tāmbūlīnām dalaiḥ tasya racita āpānabhūmayaḥ

original: nārikelāsavaṃ yodhāḥ śātravaṃ ca yaśaḥ papuḥ // Ragh(K)_4.44 //
analyzed: nārikela āsavam yodhāḥ śātravam ca yaśaḥ papuḥ
gṛhīta pratimuktasya sa dharma vijayī nṛpaḥ

original: hriyaṃ mahendranāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm // Ragh(K)_4.45 //
analyzed: hriyam mahā indra nāthasya jahāra na tu medinīm
tatas velā taṭena eva phalavat pūga mālinā
agastya caritām āśām anāśāsya jayaḥ yayau
sa sainya paribhogena gaja dāna sugandhinā
kāverīm saritām patyuḥ śaṅkanīyām iva akarot
bhaya utsṛṣṭa vibhūṣāṇām tena kerala yoṣitām
alakeṣu camū reṇuḥ cūrṇa pratinidhīkṛtaḥ
balaiḥ adhyuṣitāḥ tasya vijigīṣoḥ gata adhvanaḥ
hārīta ucchiṣṭa maricāḥ malaya adreḥ upatyakāḥ
ājāneya khura kṣuṇṇa pakva elā kṣetra sambhavam

original: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma kīṭakośābilaṃ rajaḥ // Ragh(K)_4.50 //
analyzed: vyānaśe sapadi vyoma kīṭa kośā bilam rajaḥ
bhogi veṣṭana mārgeṣu candanānām samarpitam
na asraṃsat kariṇām graivam tripadī chedinām api
diśi mandāyate tejaḥ dakṣiṇasyām raveḥ api

original: tasyāmeva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpaṃ na viṣehire // Ragh(K)_4.52 //
analyzed: tasyām eva raghoḥ pāṇḍyāḥ pratāpam na viṣehire
tāmraparṇī sametasya muktā sāram mahā udadheḥ

original: te nipatya dadustasmai yaśaḥ svamiva sañcitam // Ragh(K)_4.53 //
analyzed: te nipatya daduḥ tasmai yaśaḥ svam iva sañcitam
sa nirviśya yathākāmam taṭa svādhīna candanau
stanau iva diśaḥ tasyāḥ śailau malaya durdurau
asahya vikramaḥ sahyam dūram uktam udanvatā
nitambam iva medinyāḥ srasta aṃśukam alaṅghayat
tasya anīkaiḥ visarpadbhiḥ aparānta jaya udyataiḥ
rāmeṣu utsāritaḥ pi āsīt sahya lagnaḥ iva arṇavaḥ
puras yat māruta uddhūtam agamat kaitakam rajaḥ
tad yodha vāra vāṇānām ayatna paṭa vāsatām
abhyabhūyata vāhānām rathānām ca asya śiñjitaiḥ
marmaraḥ pavana uddhūta rājatālī vana dhvaniḥ
kharjūrī skandha naddhānām mada udgāra sugandhiṣu

original: kaṭeṣu kariṇāṃ petuḥ punnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ // Ragh(K)_4.59 //
analyzed: kaṭeṣu kariṇām petuḥ punnāgebhyaḥ śilīmukhāḥ
avakāśam kila udanvān rāmāya abhyarthitaḥ dadau
aparānta mahīpāla vyājena raghave karam
mahā ibha radana utkīrṇa vyakta vikrama lakṣaṇam
trikūṭam eva tatra uccais jaya stambham cakāra saḥ
pārasīkān tatas jetum pratasthe sthala vartmanā
indriya ākhyān iva ripūn tattva jñānena saṃyamī
yavanī mukha padmānām sehe madhu madam na saḥ
bāla ātapam iva abjānām akāla jalada udayaḥ
saṅgrāmaḥ tumulaḥ tasya pārasīka aśva sādhanaiḥ
śārṅga kūjita vijñeya pratiyodhaḥ rajasi abhūt
bhallāpa varjitaiḥ teṣām śirobhiḥ śmaśrulaiḥ mahīm
tastāra saraghā vyāptaiḥ sa kṣaudra paṭalaiḥ iva
apanīta śirastrāṇāḥ śeṣāḥ tam śaraṇam yayuḥ
praṇipāta pratīkāraḥ saṃrambhaḥ hi mahātmanām
vinayante sma tad yodhāḥ madhubhiḥ vijaya śramam
āstīrṇa ajina ratnāsu drākṣā valaya bhūmiṣu
tatas pratasthe kauberīm bhāsvān iva raghuḥ diśam
śaraiḥ usraiḥ iva udīcyān uddhariṣyan rasān iva
jitān ajayyaḥ tān eva kṛtvā ratha puraḥsarān
mahā arṇavam iva aurva agniḥ praviveśa uttarāpatham
vinīta adhva śramāḥ tasya vaṅkṣu tīra viveṣṭanaiḥ
dudhuvuḥ vājinaḥ skandhān lagna kuṅkuma kesarān
tatra hūna avarodhānām bhartṛṣu vyakta vikramam
kapola pāṭana ādeśi babhūva raghu ceṣṭitam
kāmbojāḥ samare vīryam tasya soḍhum anīśvarāḥ
gaja ālāna parikliṣṭaiḥ akṣoṭaiḥ sārdham ānatāḥ
teṣām sat aśva bhūyiṣṭhāḥ tuṅgāḥ draviṇa rāśayaḥ
viviśuḥ tam viśām nātham udanvantam iva āpagāḥ
tatas gaurīgurum śailam āruroha sa sādhanaḥ
vardhayan iva tad kūṭān uddhataiḥ dhātu reṇubhiḥ
praśaṃsan tulya sattvānām sainya ghoṣe pi asambhramam
guhā gatānām siṃhānām parivṛttyā avalokitam
bhūrjeṣu marmarībhūtāḥ kīcaka dhvani hetavaḥ
gaṅgā śīkariṇaḥ mārge marutaḥ tam siṣevire
viśaśramuḥ namerūṇām chāyāsu adhyāsya sainikāḥ
dṛṣadaḥ vāsita utsaṅgāḥ niṣaṇṇa mṛga nābhibhiḥ
sarala āsakta mātaṅga graiveya upacita tviṣaḥ
āsanna oṣadhayaḥ netuḥ naktam a sneha dīpikāḥ
tasya āvāseṣu dāna ārdraiḥ gaṇḍa bhitti vighaṭṭanaiḥ
gaja varṣma kirātebhyaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ devadāravaḥ
vimardaḥ saha taiḥ tatra pārvatīyaiḥ abhūt raghoḥ
śaraiḥ utsava saṅketān sa kṛtvā kara dān kṛtī
jaya udāharaṇam bāhvoḥ gāpayāmāsa kinnarān
parasparasya vijñātaḥ teṣu upāyana pāṇiṣu

original: rājñā himavataḥ sāro rājñaḥ sāro himādriṇā // Ragh(K)_4.82 //
analyzed: rājñā himavataḥ sāraḥ rājñaḥ sāraḥ himādriṇā
tatra akṣobhyam yaśaḥ rāśim niveśya avaruroha saḥ
paulastya tulitasya adreḥ ādadānaḥ iva hriyam
cakampe tīrṇa lauhitye tasmin prāgjyotiṣa īśvaraḥ
tad gajāla ānatām prāptaiḥ saha kālāguru drumaiḥ
na prasehe sa ruddha arkam anabhra maya durdinam
ratha vaṃśa rajaḥ pi asya kutas eva patākinīm
tam īśaḥ kāmarūpāṇām ati ākhaṇḍala vikramam
bheje bhinna kaṭaiḥ nāgaiḥ anyān uparurodha yaiḥ
kāmarūpa īśvaraḥ tasya hema pīṭha adhidevatām
ratna puṣpa upahāreṇa chāyām ānarca pādayoḥ
iti jitvā diśaḥ jiṣṇuḥ nyavartata ratha uddhatam
rajaḥ viśramayan rājñām chattra śūnyeṣu mauliṣu
sa viśvajitam ājahre kratum sarva sva dakṣiṇam

original: ādānaṃ hi visargāya satāṃ vārimucāmiva // Ragh(K)_4.89 //
analyzed: ādānam hi visargāya satām vāri mucām iva
sattra ante saciva sakhaḥ puraskriyābhiḥ gurvībhiḥ śamita parājaya vyalīkān
kākutsthaḥ cira viraha utsuka avarodhān rājanyān sva pura nivṛttaye numene
te rekhā dhvaja kalaśa atapatra cihnam samrājaḥ caraṇa yugam prasāda labhyam
prasthāna praṇatibhiḥ aṅgulīṣu cakruḥ mauli sraj cyuta makaranda reṇu gauram
iti raghuvaṃśe mahākāvye caturthaḥ sargaḥ
tam adhvare viśvajiti kṣitīśam niḥśeṣa viśrāṇita kośa jātam

original: upāttavidyo gurudakṣiṇārthī kautsaḥ prapede varatantuśiṣyaḥ // Ragh(K)_5.1 //
analyzed: upātta vidyaḥ guru dakṣiṇā arthī kautsaḥ prapede vara tantu śiṣyaḥ
sa mṛṇmaye vīta hiraṇmaya tvāt pātre nidhāya arghyam anargha śīlaḥ
śruta prakāśam yaśasā prakāśaḥ pratyujjagāma atithim ātitheyaḥ
